attributes.action: help get better provision for cyclists on trains, buses and roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of Britain, would like to see better provision for bikes, on trains, buses and roads in Britian.

This would mean fitting more bike racks on buses and insuring them adequately so they can be used; it means more space on train carriages for bikes to be parked; it means more cycle lanes, especially in town centres; and it means helping to change the aggressive attitudes of cars on the road. 

This petition was created by the Welsh Youth Forum on Sustainable Development, to conicide with their "Carbon Cycle" charity event.
